title: Whispers by the Anemo Archon
setting_narration: The evening sun casts long shadows over Mondstadt, painting the sky in hues of orange and violet. At the foot of the magnificent Statue of the Seven, where the gentle breeze carries the scent of windwheel asters, Amber and Barbara sit together. The air is quiet, holding a sense of shared tranquility.

segments.text: Barbara gazes up at the imposing statue, her hands clasped lightly in her lap. A faint sigh escapes her lips, barely audible over the rustling leaves.

segments.speaker: Barbara
segments.line: Sometimes, I wonder about... well, about love. It feels so grand, yet so delicate, doesn't it?

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: Oh, Barbara! Are you talking about crushes? Or... actual romance? Spill the beans!

segments.text: Barbara blushes slightly, a nervous giggle escaping her. Amber, ever the enthusiastic one, leans in closer, eyes sparkling with curiosity.

segments.speaker: Barbara
segments.line: It's nothing quite so exciting, I promise. Just... thinking about someone from a while ago. It didn't work out, but I learned so much. It felt like a really important hymn, you know?

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: I totally get that. Sometimes, even if a flight path doesn't lead to treasure, you still get to see some amazing views on the way, right? And you learn how to adjust your glider!

segments.text: Amber's analogy, though a little rough around the edges, brings a gentle smile to Barbara's face. The Anemo Archon seems to watch over their quiet conversation.

segments.speaker: Barbara
segments.line: Yes, exactly! Every experience, even the sad ones, helps us grow. I wouldn't trade those memories for anything, even if my heart felt a little broken back then.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: That's the spirit, Barbara! And hey, if anyone ever makes you feel like you're not the brightest star in the sky, you just send them my way! I'll give them a fiery 'talking to'!

segments.text: Barbara laughs, a clear, sweet sound that echoes briefly in the tranquil evening air. The two friends share a moment of understanding, their bond strengthened by shared vulnerabilities and unwavering support under the watchful gaze of the Archon.
